alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 6:10PM PST until March 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, but 4 to 8 inches above 2000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
